languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт тепло улыбается и подзывает вас ближе обычного — но все еще не касается кожи.{/n} "Тогда закрывай глаза, {name}. И слушай мой голос..."
{n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт тепло улыбается и подзывает вас ближе обычного — но все еще не касается кожи.{/n} "Тогда закрывай глаза, {name}. И слушай мой голос..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than ever — but still doesn't touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特露出温暖的笑容，示意你比平常更贴近她的身旁，但依旧保持着没有肌肤接触的状态。{/n}“闭上眼睛，{name}。听我的声音……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特露出温暖的笑容，示意你比平常更贴近她的身旁，但依旧保持着没有肌肤接触的状态。{/n}“闭上眼睛，{name}。听我的声音……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet esboza una cálida sonrisa y te anima a que te acerques más de lo habitual, pero sin llegar a tocar tu piel.{/n} «Entonces cierra los ojos, {name}. Y escucha mi voz...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet esboza una cálida sonrisa y te anima a que te acerques más de lo habitual, pero sin llegar a tocar tu piel.{/n} «Entonces cierra los ojos, {name}. Y escucha mi voz...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un sourire chaleureux et s'approche de vous plus que d'ordinaire, sans toutefois vous toucher.{/n} « Dans ce cas, fermez les yeux, {name}, et écoutez ma voix... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un sourire chaleureux et s'approche de vous plus que d'ordinaire, sans toutefois vous toucher.{/n} « Dans ce cas, fermez les yeux, {name}, et écoutez ma voix... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lächelt warm und winkt dich näher heran als sonst, berührt aber immer noch nicht deine Haut.{/n} "Dann schließt Eure Augen, {name}. Und lauscht meiner Stimme ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lächelt warm und winkt dich näher heran als sonst, berührt aber immer noch nicht deine Haut.{/n} "Dann schließt Eure Augen, {name}. Und lauscht meiner Stimme ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあたたかい微笑みを浮かべ、いつもよりも近くまで来るようにと手招きするものの、まだあなたの肌には触れない。{/n}「それならば目を閉じろ、{name}。そして我の声を聞くんだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあたたかい微笑みを浮かべ、いつもよりも近くまで来るようにと手招きするものの、まだあなたの肌には触れない。{/n}「それならば目を閉じろ、{name}。そして我の声を聞くんだ…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, . And listen to my voice..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, içtenlikle gülümseyip seni normalde olduğundan daha yakınına çağırıyor ama sana dokunmuyor.{/n} "O zaman gözlerini kapat {name}. Sesimi dinle..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet smiles warmly and beckons you closer than usual, but she still does not touch your skin.{/n} "Then close your eyes, {name}. And listen to my voice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, içtenlikle gülümseyip seni normalden daha yakın bir şekilde çağırıyor ama yine de sana dokunmuyor.{/n} "O zaman gözlerini kapat {name}. Sesimi dinle..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
